product_name: Switch Stormrider Polarized Interchangeable Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The innovative and versatile Switch Stormrider Polarized Interchangeable Sunglasses feature unique magnetic "eye cups" that help your sunglasses function like multi-sport goggles.
short_description: The innovative and versatile Switch Stormrider Polarized Interchangeable Sunglasses feature unique magnetic "eye cups" that help your sunglasses function like multi-sport goggles.
